General.Name: Mogo Inc
General.Description: Mogo Inc. operates as a financial technology company in Canada, Europe, and internationally. The company's digital solutions to help its members improve their path to wealth creation and financial freedom. It also provides MogoTrade, a stock trading app; Moka; and MogoMoney that provides online personal loans. In addition, the company offers digital loans and mortgages; and operates a payments platform that powers next-generation card programs for companies in Europe and Canada. Mogo Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 516-409 Granville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1T2
